PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-14452017-11-23ISED,  NRC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council of Canada - The Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing the National Research Council Canada to ENTER INTO A COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with The Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada for all employees in the Information Services Group for four (4) year agreement expiring on 20 June 2018, pursuant to Section 112 of the FEDERAL PUBLIC SERVICE LABOUR RELATIONS ACT.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: National Research Council of Canada - The Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada ** Collective Agreement **
